TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClientHandler extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler

summary.span: .NET Framework 和 .NET Core 2.0 及更低版本中由 使用的默认消息处理程序。

span.span: The default message handler used by in .NET Framework and .NET Core 2.0 and earlier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生`HttpClientHandler`自该类的类和类使开发人员能够配置各种选项, 包括从代理到身份验证。The `HttpClientHandler` class and classes derived from it enable developers to configure a variety of options ranging from proxies to authentication. ### .NET Core 中的 HttpClientHandlerHttpClientHandler in .NET Core 从 .net Core 2.1 开始, 类`HttpClientHandler`而不是提供高层 HTTP 网络 api 使用的实现。Starting with .NET Core 2.1, the class instead of `HttpClientHandler` provides the implementation used by higher-level HTTP networking APIs. 可以通过以下任一方式将应用`HttpClientHandler`程序配置为改用:You can configure your application to use `HttpClientHandler` instead in any of the following ways: - 通过调用方法, 如下所示:By calling the method as follows: ```csharp AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.UseSocketsHttpHandler", false); ``` ```vb AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.UseSocketsHttpHandler", False) ``` - 通过在`System.Net.Http.UseSocketsHttpHandler` *. runtimeconfig.template.json*配置文件中定义开关 netcore:By defining the `System.Net.Http.UseSocketsHttpHandler` switch in the *.netcore.runtimeconfig.json* configuration file: ```json "runtimeOptions": { "configProperties": { "System.Net.Http.UseSocketsHttpHandler": false } } ``` - 通过定义名为`DOTNET_SYSTEM_NET_HTTP_USESOCKETSHTTPHANDLER`的环境变量并将其设置`false`为或0。By defining an environment variable named `DOTNET_SYSTEM_NET_HTTP_USESOCKETSHTTPHANDLER` and setting it to either `false` or 0. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.http.httpclienthandler/cs/source.cs#1)] 前面的代码示例使用`async Task Main()`入口点。The preceding code example uses an `async Task Main()` entry point. 该功能需要C# 7.1 或更高版本。That feature requires C# 7.1 or later.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否应跟随重定向响应。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler should follow redirection responses.

value.span: 如果处理程序应跟随重定向响应, 则为;否则为。

span.span: if the handler should follow redirection responses; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望`true`处理程序自动跟随 HTTP 重定向标头到资源的新位置, 则设置为。Set to `true` if you want the handler to automatically follow HTTP redirection headers to the new location of the resource. 要遵循的重定向的最大数目由属性设置。The maximum number of redirections to follow is set by the property. 如果设置为`false`, 则将 http 状态代码从300到399的所有 http 响应返回到应用程序。If is set to `false`, all HTTP responses with an HTTP status code from 300 to 399 are returned to the application. 在自动重定向时清除了 Authorization 标头, 并且处理程序会自动尝试对重定向的位置重新进行身份验证。The Authorization header is cleared on auto-redirects and the handler automatically tries to re-authenticate to the redirected location. 在实践中, 这意味着应用程序无法将自定义身份验证信息放入授权标头 (如果可能遇到重定向)。In practice, this means that an application can't put custom authentication information into the Authorization header if it is possible to encounter redirection. 相反, 应用程序必须实现并注册自定义身份验证模块。Instead, the application must implement and register a custom authentication module. > [!NOTE] > 在设置为`true`的情况下, 即使从 HTTPS uri 重定向到 HTTP uri, .NET Framework 也会跟随重定向。 With set to `true`, the .NET Framework will follow redirections even when being redirected to an HTTP URI from an HTTPS URI. 即使将设置为, `true`.net Core 版本1.0、1.1 和2.0 也不会跟随从 HTTPS 到 HTTP 的重定向。.NET Core versions 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0 will not follow a redirection from HTTPS to HTTP even if is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于全局程序集缓存 ( `System.Net.Http` GAC) 中的 .NET Framework 4.x 二进制文件, 默认值为。 For the .NET Framework 4.x `System.Net.Http` binary in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), the default value is . 使用 NuGet 包 v 4.1.0 to v 4.3.2 时, 默认值为和。 [ `System.Net.Http` ](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/) When the [`System.Net.Http` NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/) v4.1.0 to v4.3.2 is used, the default is and . 在 NuGet 包4.3.2 后, 将使用的默认值。After NuGet package v4.3.2, the default value of is used.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于通过处理程序存储服务器 Cookie 的 Cookie 容器。

value.span: 用于通过处理程序存储服务器 Cookie 的 Cookie 容器。

span.span: The cookie container used to store server cookies by the handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供类的实例, 该类包含与此处理程序关联的 cookie。 The property provides an instance of the class that contains the cookies associated with this handler. 如果属性为`true`, 则属性表示用于存储服务器 cookie 的 cookie 容器。 If the property is `true`, the property represents the cookie container used to store the server cookies. 用户可以在使用此属性发送请求之前设置自定义 cookie。The user can set custom cookies before sending requests using this property. 如果该属性为 false, 并且用户将 cookie 添加到, 则 cookie 会被忽略, 并且不会发送到服务器。If the property is false and the user adds cookies to , cookies are ignored and not sent to the server. 如果将设置`null`为,将引发异常。 Setting the to `null` will throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .property class System.Func`5<class System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain, valuetype System.Net.Security.SslPolicyErrors, bool> DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator
Public Shared ReadOnly Property DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator As Func(Of HttpRequestMessage, X509Certificate2, X509Chain, SslPolicyErrors, Boolean)

public: static property Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator { Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取始终返回 的缓存委托。

span.span: Gets a cached delegate that always returns .

value.span: 始终返回 的缓存委托。

span.span: A cached delegate that always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特别是在测试方案中, 一种常见模式使用来连接到证书不应验证的服务器, 例如自签名证书。Particularly in test scenarios, a common pattern use to connect to a server with a certificate that shouldn't be validated, such as a self-signed certificate. 通常通过`True`将属性设置为始终返回的委托来实现此目的; 这表示证书已通过验证。 You commonly do this with by setting the property to a delegate that always returns `True`; this indicates that the certificate has passed validation. 但是, 并非所有实现都支持此回调和某些引发。However, not all implementations support this callback, and some throw . 属性解决了这一限制。The property addresses this limitation. 可以将属性返回的委托分配给属性, 如下面的示例所示:The delegate returned by the property can be assigned to the property, as the following example does: ```cs handler.ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback = HttpClientHandler.DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator; ``` 这为实现提供了一个已知的对象引用标识, 旨在表达开发人员的意图。This gives implementations a known object reference identity that expresses the developer's intention. 如果存储在属性中的对象的引用等于, 则运行时能够完全禁用平台上的验证, 否则将引发。If the object stored in the property is reference equals to , the runtime is able to entirely disable validation on a platform that would otherwise throw a . 作为一项有利, 开发人员可以使用此属性使工具更轻松地标记禁用证书验证的风险, 使开发人员可以更轻松地避免发送不安全的应用程序。As a side benefit, developers can use this property to make it easier for tools to flag the danger of disabling certificate validation, which makes it easier for developers to avoid shipping insecure applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 获取或设置使用 对象发出请求时允许的最大并发连接数（每个服务器终结点）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent connections (per server endpoint) allowed when making requests using an object.

summary.span: 请注意，该限制针对每个服务器终结点，例如，值为 256 表示允许 256 个到 http://www.adatum.com/ 的并发连接，以及另外 256 个到 http://www.adventure-works.com/ 的并发连接。

span.span: Note that the limit is per server endpoint, so for example a value of 256 would permit 256 concurrent connections to http://www.adatum.com/ and another 256 to http://www.adventure-works.com/.

value.span: 对象允许的最大并发连接数 (每个服务器终结点)。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent connections (per server endpoint) allowed by an object.

summary.span: 获取或设置处理程序使用的最大请求内容缓冲区大小。

span.span: The maximum request content buffer size in bytes.

value.span: 默认值为 2 GB。

span.span: The default value is 2 gigabytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用可以将属性设置为较小的值, 以限制请求缓冲区的大小。An app can set the property to a lower value to limit the size of the request buffer. 如果请求内容的大小大于属性, 则会引发异常。If the size of the request content is greater than the property, an exception is thrown.

span.span: For example, if the value is 64, then 65536 bytes are allowed for the maximum response headers' length.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否随请求发送授权标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler sends an Authorization header with the request.

value.span: 表示处理程序在发生身份验证之后随请求一起发送 HTTP 授权标头；否则为 。

span.span: for the handler to send an HTTP Authorization header with requests after authentication has taken place; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对特定的客户端请求成功通过身份验证后, 如果属性为`true`并提供凭据, 则将与属性中提供的凭据列表匹配。After a client request to a specific is successfully authenticated, if the property is `true` and credentials are supplied, matches against the credential list supplied in the property. 授权标头随每个请求一起发送到任何匹配上一个正斜杠的特定的。The Authorization header is sent with each request to any that matches the specific up to the last forward slash. 如果未成功对特定的客户端请求进行身份验证, 则该请求将使用标准身份验证过程。If the client request to a specific is not successfully authenticated, the request uses standard authentication procedures. 除了第一个请求之外, 属性指示是否将身份验证信息与后续请求一起发送到, 该请求与最后一个正斜杠匹配 (而不等待)服务器面临的挑战。With the exception of the first request, the property indicates whether to send authentication information with subsequent requests to a that matches the specific up to the last forward slash without waiting to be challenged by the server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::IWebProxy ^ Proxy { System::Net::IWebProxy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::IWebProxy ^ value); };
member this.Proxy : System.Net.IWebProxy with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置处理程序使用的代理信息。

span.span: Gets or sets proxy information used by the handler.

value.span: 处理程序使用的代理信息。

span.span: The proxy information used by the handler.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识用于处理对 Internet 资源的请求的对象。 The property identifies the object to use to process requests to Internet resources. 若要指定不应使用代理, 请将属性设置为方法返回的代理实例。To specify that no proxy should be used, set the property to the proxy instance returned by the method. 本地计算机或应用程序配置文件可以指定使用默认代理。The local computer or application config file may specify that a default proxy be used. 如果指定了属性, 则属性中的代理设置将替代本地计算机或应用程序配置文件, 并且处理程序将使用指定的代理设置。If the property is specified, then the proxy settings from the property override the local computer or application config file and the handler will use the proxy settings specified. 如果未在配置文件中指定代理, 并且未指定属性, 则处理程序将使用从本地计算机上的 Internet Explorer 继承的代理设置。If no proxy is specified in a config file and the property is unspecified, the handler uses the proxy settings inherited from Internet Explorer on the local computer. 如果 Internet Explorer 中没有代理设置, 请求将直接发送到服务器。If there are no proxy settings in Internet Explorer, the request is sent directly to the server. 类分析一个代理跳过列表, 其中包含从 internet explorer 继承的通配符字符, 该列表与绕过列表直接由 internet explorer 分析。The class parses a proxy bypass list with wildcard characters inherited from Internet Explorer the same as the bypass list is parsed directly by Internet Explorer. 例如, 类会将 Internet Explorer 中的 "nt \*" 跳过列表分析为 "nt.\*" 的正则表达式。For example, the class will parse a bypass list of "nt\*" from Internet Explorer as a regular expression of "nt.\*". 因此的 URL `http://nt.com`会使用类并使用 Internet Explorer 来跳过代理。So a URL of `http://nt.com` would bypass the proxy using the class and using Internet Explorer. 类支持本地代理跳过。The class supports local proxy bypass. 如果满足以下任一条件, 则类将目标视为本地:The class considers a destination to be local if any of the following conditions are met: 1. 目标包含平面名称 (URL 中没有点)。The destination contains a flat name (no dots in the URL). 2. 目标包含环回地址 (或), 或者目标包含分配给本地计算机的。The destination contains a loopback address ( or ) or the destination contains an assigned to the local computer. 3. 目标的域后缀与本地计算机的域后缀 () 匹配。The domain suffix of the destination matches the local computer's domain suffix ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation is does not block. 它将返回实例以表示异步操作。It returns an instance of to represent the asynchronous operation. 操作完成时, 将包含响应消息。When the operation completes, contains the response message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 当由对象发出的请求应在服务器请求时, 将此属性设置为, 并使用当前登录用户的凭据进行身份验证。Set this property to `true` when requests made by the object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序, 这在大多数情况下都是所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序 (如 ASP.NET 应用程序), 通常应将属性设置为代表其发出请求的客户端的凭据。For middle-tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.
